alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence; Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 4:50PM MDT until July 04 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Butte County in northwestern South Dakota... West central Meade County in west central South Dakota... East central Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 450 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sturgis, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Sturgis, Vale, Apple Springs, Bear Butte State Park and Fort Meade. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 28 and 37. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
